message: Let's start with a fair split, and we can negotiate from here
You're starting high, let's meet in the middle!
Meeting in the middle wasn't good enough, I'll give you a bit more
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more to make it worth my while
I'm not backing down, meet me at 60/40 or we'll be in trouble!
I'm getting desperate, but I'm still not willing to give up too much
You're getting desperate, I'm not going to give in yet!
I'm running out of time, but I'm still not giving up
I'm not going to let you walk away with the majority, it's now or never!
I'm running out of time, this is my final offer
It's now or never, take it or leave it!
